Msg.show({title:"WE-II Final Project",message:"A REST client of ARSnova visualising the current statistics data of the backend",scope:this,buttons:[{itemId:"yes",text:"OK"}],fn:function(b){if(b=="yes"){}}})}});var data=[];var stop=false;function pad(a){return("0"+a).slice(-2)}function getData(){if(!stop){$("#data1").fadeOut("2000");$("#data2").fadeOut("2000");$("#data3").fadeOut("2000");$("#data4").fadeOut("2000");$("#data5").fadeOut("2000");$.ajax({url:"http://query.yahooapis.com/v1/public/yql",jsonp:"callback",dataType:"jsonp",data:{q:'select * from json where url="https://arsnova.eu/statistics/"',format:"json"},async:false,success:function(a){$("#data1").text(a.query.results.json.activeUsers);$("#data2").text(a.query.results.json.openSessions);$("#data3").text(a.query.results.json.closedSessions);$("#data4").text(a.query.results.json.questions);$("#data5").text(a.query.results.json.answers);$("#data1").show("slow");$("#data2").show("slow");$("#data3").show("slow");$("#data4").show("slow");$("#data5").show("slow");if(data.length>9){data.shift();Ext.getStore("ARSnovaVis").setData(data)}var b=new Date();var c=pad(b.getHours())+":"+pad(b.getMinutes())+":"+pad(b.getSeconds());data.push({time:c,activeUsers:a.query.results.json.activeUsers,openSessions:a.query.results.json.openSessions,closedSessions:a.query.results.json.closedSessions,questions:a.query.results.json.questions,answers:a.query.results.json.answers});Ext.getCmp("Chart1")._axes[0]._minimum=0;Ext.getCmp("Chart1")._axes[0]._maximum=parseInt(a.query.results.json.activeUsers)+5;Ext.getCmp("Chart2")._axes[0]._minimum=parseInt(a.query.results.json.openSessions)-10;Ext.getCmp("Chart2")._axes[0]._maximum=parseInt(a.query.results.json.openSessions)+10;Ext.getCmp("Chart3")._axes[0]._minimum=parseInt(a.query.results.json.closedSessions)-10;Ext.getCmp("Chart3")._axes[0]._maximum=parseInt(a.query.results.json.closedSessions)+10;Ext.getCmp("Chart4")._axes[0]._minimum=parseInt(a.query.results.json.questions)-10;Ext.getCmp("Chart4")._axes[0]._maximum=parseInt(a.query.results.json.questions)+10;Ext.getCmp("Chart5")._axes[0]._minimum=parseInt(a.query.results.json.answers)-10;Ext.getCmp("Chart5")._axes[0]._maximum=parseInt(a.query.results.json.answers)+10;Ext.getStore("ARSnovaVis").setData(data);Ext.getStore("ARSnovaVis").load()}})}}Ext.define("dashboard.store.ARSnovaVis
